summary: When the live-action Detective Pikachu movie was first announced, we all had an initial fear that the cgi pokémon wouldn’t look...
body: When the live-action Detective Pikachu movie was first announced, we all had an initial fear that the cgi pokémon wouldn’t look good. Now we know that those fears did not go away when we kept watching the trailer, but instead detached from our bodies, all joined together, and took the form of a live-action Sonic movie.

reblog.comment: When the live-action Detective Pikachu movie was first announced, we all had an initial fear that the cgi pokémon wouldn’t look good. Now we know that those fears did not go away when we kept watching the trailer, but instead detached from our bodies, all joined together, and took the form of a live-action Sonic movie.

trail.content_raw: When the live-action Detective Pikachu movie was first announced, we all had an initial fear that the cgi pokémon wouldn’t look good. Now we know that those fears did not go away when we kept watching the trailer, but instead detached from our bodies, all joined together, and took the form of a live-action Sonic movie.
trail.content: When the live-action Detective Pikachu movie was first announced, we all had an initial fear that the cgi pokémon wouldn’t look good. Now we know that those fears did not go away when we kept watching the trailer, but instead detached from our bodies, all joined together, and took the form of a live-action Sonic movie.

summary: Sonic The Hedgehog Movie First Look: Check Out the Exclusive Official Poster - IGN
title: Sonic The Hedgehog Movie First Look: Check Out the Exclusive Official Poster - IGN
description:
That’s …certainly not what I expected. Maybe they should’ve adapted Sonic Unleashed, or maybe it’ll actually look pretty dece-

“I don’t think SEGA was entirely happy with the eye decision, but these sorts of things you go, ‘It’s going to look weird if we don’t do this.’ But everything is a discussion, and that’s kind of the goal, which is to only change what’s necessary and stay true to the rest of it,” said Miller. “He’s not going to feel like a Pixar character would because I don’t think that’s the right aesthetic to make it feel like part of our world.”

Well, that’s another reason for me to dislike Miller.

reblog.comment:

Well, that’s another reason for me to dislike Miller.

trail.content_raw:

Well, that’s another reason for me to dislike Miller.
trail.content:

“I don’t think SEGA was entirely happy with the eye decision, but these sorts of things you go, ‘It’s going to look weird if we don’t do this.’ But everything is a discussion, and that’s kind of the goal, which is to only change what’s necessary and stay true to the rest of it,” said Miller. “He’s not going to feel like a Pixar character would because I don’t think that’s the right aesthetic to make it feel like part of our world.”

Well, that’s another reason for me to dislike Miller.

summary: You know what’s really telling? Detective Pikachu had a poster that just showed its logo, and then out of nowhere its trailer...
body:
You know what’s really telling?

Detective Pikachu had a poster that just showed its logo, and then out of nowhere its trailer drops and shows off all of the Pokemon in their full glory.

Sonic meanwhile has a poster with it’s main character in shadows

Pikachu was so confident in its character design choices that they laid all of their cards on the table. Sonic meanwhile is hiding its character in shadows, with the only teaser trailer being shown at a very private event.

There’s a palpable lack of confidence on Sonic’s end. They know people will hate what they came up with for Sonic’s design. Which makes me wonder why they even bothered putting him on the poster at all

There’s a palpable lack of confidence on Sonic’s end. They know people will hate what they came up with for Sonic’s design. Which makes me wonder why they even bothered putting him on the poster at all

summary: I'll be honest, when the DP trailer first dropped, I was half convinced it was a prank or a fanvid that someone spent a Lot of...
caption:
I’ll be honest, when the DP trailer first dropped, I was half convinced it was a prank or a fanvid that someone spent a Lot of time on (somehow the involvement of Ryan Reynolds and other actors did nothing to sway my conviction) 

 Anyway, it reminded me of other, fan made Pokemon videos, where the Pokemon were portrayed as people in onesies, which led to…. Whatever this is

summary: Why the frick frack paddy whack fickle fackle FUCK have we just decided to collectively let go of the fact that Ash Katchum’s...
body:
Why the frick frack paddy whack fickle fackle FUCK have we just decided to collectively let go of the fact that Ash Katchum’s mom married a Mr. fucking Mime. We can say the detective pikachu memes are dead, or that the discourse ended..but we all know. It sits at the back of all of our minds. 

Why are we sitting in silent terror.

reblog.comment:

Why are we sitting in silent terror.

summary: being at uni and finding likeminded ppl really is the best thing like I can’t believe I spent my pre-teens taking down my...
body: being at uni and finding likeminded ppl really is the best thing like I can’t believe I spent my pre-teens taking down my pokemon posters before friends came over and watching cartoons on incognito tabs and today me and my classmates talked about how cool the detective pikachu movie looks and my friend drew us ponysonas just for the fun of it. there’s a guy watching anime in class. a girl showed me her fursona and drew them for 3 other ppl. I mentioned hilda to someone and she fell in love with twig. it’s 2018 and cringe culture is officially fake

reblog.comment: being at uni and finding likeminded ppl really is the best thing like I can’t believe I spent my pre-teens taking down my pokemon posters before friends came over and watching cartoons on incognito tabs and today me and my classmates talked about how cool the detective pikachu movie looks and my friend drew us ponysonas just for the fun of it. there’s a guy watching anime in class. a girl showed me her fursona and drew them for 3 other ppl. I mentioned hilda to someone and she fell in love with twig. it’s 2018 and cringe culture is officially fake
